description: Translation file for a specific locale

base.description: Optional base locale from which all missing translations are automatically inherited. Must be in the format ll-CC (language-country), e.g. en-US

translations.description: Mapping of translation keys to strings

^[a-zA-Z]([a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)?$.description: Case sensitive translation key. May only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.
